headline: Science demonstrations rock the Royal Institution  video
text: Joining Alok on the famous stage of the Faraday Lecture Theatre were science writer and broadcaster Adam Rutherford, Wellcome Trust Engagement Fellow and anaesthetist Kevin Fong, Professor Frank James from the Royal Institution, Dr Gail Cardew director of science and education at the institution, science teacher and demo expert Alom Shaha, and Anna Starkey, creator of Impossible Projects at Lotto Lab at the Science Museum.
